SELECT b_recommend.`b_recommend_id`, b_recommend.`b_recommend_title`, b_recommend.`b_recommend_url`, b_recommend.`b_recommend_sort`, b_recommend.`b_recommend_remark`, b_recommend.`b_recommend_width`, b_recommend.`b_recommend_height`, DATE_FORMAT(b_recommend.`b_recommend_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_recommend_ctime`, DATE_FORMAT(b_recommend.`b_recommend_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_recommend_mtime`, b_recommend.`b_recommend_status`, xt_userinfo.`xt_userinfo_realName`, xt_attachment.* FROM b_recommend b_recommend LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo xt_userinfo ON b_recommend.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id LEFT JOIN xt_attachment xt_attachment ON b_recommend.`xt_attachment_id` = xt_attachment.xt_attachment_id WHERE 1=1
